Testing¶

Testing is completed by simply loading the trained model, requesting/applying actions and updating the current state. There are no updates done in this process. To test, navigate to RallyAI_v2/RL_Training/ and run

python test.py

Run test.py¶

Test script. Use it to test your new trained models. Configure the environment parameters to match your training ones.

  • model_name – The name of your trained model

  • num_agents – The number of agents you user for training

  • network_architecture – Number of units per hidden layer

  • input_source – “constant” or path to file. If constant, configure also:

    • episode_length

    • constant_torque

    • constant_brake

    • constant_angle

  • initial_velocity – For simulation

  • constant_velocity – For simulation
